body_html:
My apologies for being somewhat absent in this conversation, and thank you @lukemurray for picking up my slack. What you are reporting is exactly what I saw using homebrew python. I am afraid I have deleted all trace of the faulty installation and can't really defend spending more time on repeating it (it already took out a pretty big chunk of my work schedule to get it working).
I just wanted to say that I really appreciate both your contributions to this. Thanks!

body:
My apologies for being somewhat absent in this conversation, and thank you @lukemurray for picking up my slack. What you are reporting is exactly what I saw using homebrew python. I am afraid I have deleted all trace of the faulty installation and can't really defend spending more time on repeating it (it already took out a pretty big chunk of my work schedule to get it working).
I just wanted to say that I really appreciate both your contributions to this. Thanks!
